= Commits =

* ammend: add stuff to the last commit,
          fix the previous commit.
          
          Add extra files to the previous commit
           - git commit amend --no-edit
          
          Edit the previous commit message
           - git commit amend

* soft reset: undo last commit and keep the files
          
          - git reset HEAD~
          
          To reset and keep the files staged:
          - git reset --soft HEAD~
